attempt.description:
*
 The first attempt should have value 0, and for each retry the value
 should increase by 1.

id.description:
*
 Because a `TestCase` can be run multiple times (in case of a retry),
 we use this field to group messages relating to the same attempt.

workerId.description: An identifier for the worker process running this test case, if test cases are being run in parallel. The identifier will be unique per worker, but no particular format is defined - it could be an index, uuid, machine name etc - and as such should be assumed that it's not human readable.
